alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 7:24PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Roger Mills and northeastern Beckham Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 723 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Elk City. This storm was nearly stationary. Another strong thunderstorm was located about 4 miles southeast of Dempsey. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elk City, Berlin and Dempsey. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 32 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
